Message.Title: YAHOO MESSAGE BOARD TEAM IS A FAILURE!
Message.Msg: After more than a month - -Political posts having nothing do with the company under discussion dominate most of these boards. -Serial spammers with their identity theft and scam url's still get unlimited id's; post all over these boards; bump their own posts; and do not get deleted, even if reported. So questions: Is the message board team completely incompetent; or have the "suits" sent down the word that without this phony "head count", Yahoo's advertising revenue would drop? What ever happened to integrety? Why does Yahoo have such a miserable corporate culture?

Topic.Title: Rhinoplasty

Message.Msg: Not a sexist? OK, how about rude? How's your nose there, doc? Again, who cares what her nose looks like, if she had a do-over or what the heck? My only concern is what the heck she does with YHOO other than morale boosting perks like food, phones & Christmas parties. I still say Strong Buy to $19 then HOLD because hopefully the potential of this company will one day be realized for the longs... Blessings & Shalom
